stocks.impact_theory: DoorDash reported strong Q4 growth forecast driven by surging delivery demand, signaling resilient consumer spending despite economic headwinds. Economically, it highlights strength in gig economy and on-demand services. Market psychology shifts to bullish on tech-enabled consumer plays. Historical parallel: Similar post-earnings surges in 2021-2022 during recovery. Analogies: Like Uber Eats boom during lockdowns; a rubber band snapping back after compression.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Premarket surge of 11% on upbeat guidance outweighing any misses; X sentiment positive on growth, web news confirms strong orders up 32%.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for 10-15% gains in 1-2 weeks on momentum.
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Avoid short; high risk of squeeze.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Broader market selloff due to geo tensions, competition from Uber.

stocks.justification: Clear earnings catalyst with strong premarket reaction and historical precedent.

stocks.impact_theory: Deere beat Q1 earnings and raised FY2026 outlook amid farm demand stabilization. Implications: Positive for ag sector recovery, commodity prices support. Psych: Relief rally after fears. Parallels: 2023 post-downturn beats. Analogies: Tractor pulling economy uphill; phoenix rising from ag slump.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: 10% jump post-earnings, raised guidance; limited X negativity.

stocks.justification: Direct earnings beat with raised outlook.

stocks.impact_theory: Quanta beat Q4 EPS/revenue, record backlog from infrastructure demand. Econ: Boost from electrification, renewables. Psych: Infrastructure spend confidence. Parallels: Post-IIJA surges. Analogies: Building bridges in bull market; snowball effect on backlog.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: 4%+ rise on beats, positive analyst notes.

stocks.justification: Solid beat but less explosive move.

stocks.impact_theory: Walmart beat Q4 but weak FY outlook disappointed, signaling consumer caution. Econ: Margin pressure from tariffs/inflation. Psych: Shift to defensive but cap gains. Parallels: 2019 tariff fears. Analogies: Speed bump on highway; cloud over sunny earnings.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Stock turns lower post-earnings despite beat; X/market focus on guidance.

stocks.impact_theory: Oil prices surge to 6-mo high on US-Iran tensions, boosting energy majors. Econ: Supply risk premium. Psych: Flight to safety in commodities. Parallels: 2019 Iran flare-up. Analogies: Rocket fuel from geopolitics; rising tide lifts oil boats.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Oil up 4%+, correlated stock lift; X sentiment on tensions.
